get ready to brighten your day with the **gemstone hues crochet beanie**! this simple and stylish beanie is worked from the bottom up, starting with the brim. the timeless granny stitch colorwork rounds create a delightful diamond pattern reminiscent of sparkling jewels. 

and with six sizes, it’s perfect for everyone—from little ones to adults—ensuring that no one misses out on its cozy charm! whether you’re out for a winter stroll or cozying up with friends, this beanie adds a splash of color and warmth to every adventure. wear it with pride, and let your inner gem shine bright!

perfect for crocheters of all levels, this pattern comes with detailed instructions, including a full video tutorial to guide you through each step.

crochet hook:
[g (4.0mm) & h (5.0mm)][1] - or size to meet gauge

notions:
[removable stitch marker][2]
[yarn needle to weave in ends][3]
[scissors][4]
[pompom][5]
if you want to make your faux fur pompom, click [**here**][6].

yarn:
[lion brand color theory][7]
100% acrylic, 246yds/100g

yardage:
total yards (color a / color b / color c / color d) yds
newborn: 112 yds (83/5/10/14) 
baby: 141 yds (105/6/12/18)
toddler: 175 yds (135/8/15/22)
child/small adult: 209 yds (158/9/17/25)
adult: 255 yds (192/11/20/32) 
large adult: 292yds (220/24/12/36)

yarn substitutions
[wecrochet swish][8] 
100% fine superwash merino wool 110yds/50g

[hobbii kind feather][9]
100% premium acrylic, 257 yds / 3.5oz

[mary maxim starlette worsted][10]
100% ultra soft acrylic, 180 yds/100g

[lion brand mandala ombre][11]
100% acrylic, 344yds/150g 

abbreviations
blo - back loop only
ch - chain
dc - double crochet
flo - front loop only
sl st - slip stitch
sc - single crochet
st(s) - stitch(es)
[stsc - stacked single crochet][12]

gauge:
15 sts x 9 rows = 4”x4” in granny stitch with 5.0mm hook
22 sts x 22 rows = 4”x4” in blo sc with 4.0mm hook

not sure what gauge is? check out this blog post: [what is crochet gauge and how to fix it][13]

sizes:
to fit head circumference: 
newborn: 13-14” (33-36 cm)
baby: 16-17” (41-43 cm)
toddler: 18-19” (46-48 cm)
child/small adult: 20-21” (51-53 cm)
adult: 22-23” (56-58 cm)
large adult: 24-25” (61-64 cm)

skill level:
intermediate
